name: The Fifth Annual International Multi-Disciplinary Conference
content: The Annual International Multi-Disciplinary Conference (AIMC) organised by the Junior College of the University of Malta is an unmissable opportunity for academics, researchers and working professionals to present their research areas in a fully-fledged academic exercise of multi-disciplinarity. This year, five keynote speakers from different areas of expertise and knowledge are scheduled to intervene in the plenary sessions. This fifth edition of the AIMC shall be held at the Conference Centre of the Ä .F. Abela Junior College, Msida, Malta, between 14 and 16 September 2022\. Participants may opt to participate either in person or by joining the sessions virtually. Details on how to access the sessions online will be available on the AIMC website in due course. [Programme](https://www.jc.um.edu.mt/aimc/conferenceprogramme) [Keynote Speakers](https://www.jc.um.edu.mt/aimc/keynotespeakers) [Travel info.](https://www.jc.um.edu.mt/aimc/travelinfo) [**Register now!**](https://www.jc.um.edu.mt/aimc/registration)
